meanings.sent1: We always go for a walk predinner to work up an appetite.

meanings.definition: An event or activity that occurs before dinner
meanings.sent1: The predinner cocktail hour is a time for socializing with friends.
meanings.sent2: The family always plays board games during the predinner gathering.
